text: Question: What kind of investment advice or recommendations are provided in the Finqalab app?  Answer: You can browse through the latest research and PSX notices on the app. Furthermore, we also have a WhatsApp community by the name Finqalab Market Insights where all the users receive investment recommendations and market insights. To be a part of this community, you will have to open a trading account with Finqalab.

Question: Do we provide private investment advisory services?  Answer: We appreciate your interest in our private assistance. A trader will be provided to you, who you can contact for latest news, trends, and ideas. They can also place your orders. In addition, you can also have a 30 mins conference call with Fatiq Bin Khursheed, CFA once a month to discuss your portfolios. Please be informed that this service is exclusively available to clients with a portfolio of PKR 5 million and above. It is important to note that while we offer our expertise, the responsibility for any profits or losses lies solely with you. For this service, our brokerage fee is 0.3% or Re 0.05/share, whichever is higher.
Question: Can I customize my investment preferences or risk tolerance in the app?  Answer: No, this feature is not available yet.
